sentences.en: Archaeologists unearth part of ancient Egyptian university.
sentences.cn: 考古学家发现古埃及大学部分遗迹.

sentences.en: Court decision defendant Mr. Wen will unearth underground backfill, restores the original condition.
sentences.cn: 法院判决被告闻先生将所挖掘的地下一层回填, 恢复原状.

sentences.en: Farmers still sometimes unearth human bones here.
sentences.cn: 农民们有时仍然能在这里挖到人骨。

sentences.en: I've asked Shirley to see what she can unearth on them.
sentences.cn: 我已经让雪莉去调查他们的情况了.

sentences.en: In one shop, I unearthed a wonderful collection of 1920s toys.
sentences.cn: 在一家商店，我发现了一套非常好玩的 20 世纪 20 年代的玩具。

sentences.en: It was always safer to leave no facts for anyone else to unearth.
sentences.cn: 不要隐瞒任何事实留待别人侦察出来.

sentences.en: Most of the unearth relics remain intact.
sentences.cn: 大多数出土文物仍保持完整无损.

sentences.en: Will it unearth anything new, or valuable?
sentences.cn: 这次会议会发现什么有新意 、 有价值的情况 吗 ?

trans.tran_cn: 发掘；揭露，发现；从洞中赶出
trans.tran_en: to find something after searching for it, especially something that has been buried in the ground or lost for a long time
to find something after searching for it, especially something that has been buried in the ground or lost for a long time
